geologger.saints.com.geologger.uicomponents

インタフェース PoiListFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    PoiActivity, PoiActivity_, PoiConfirmationActivity, PoiConfirmationActivity_
    含まれているクラス:
    PoiListFragment

    public static interface PoiListFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.

    See the Android Training lesson Communicating with Other Fragments for more information.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
